subject: Sexual Health
title: How Desire Works
description: A fast breakdown of How Desire Works for builders.

hook.text: Sexual desire is not a single feeling. It has two distinct types that arise from different brain systems.

buildup.text: Spontaneous desire arises without external triggers. It is driven by internal hormonal and neural activity.

discovery.text: Responsive desire emerges only after arousal begins through touch, intimacy, or erotic context.

twist.text: Most women experience primarily responsive desire, yet society treats spontaneous desire as the only normal kind.

climax.text: Recognizing both types as normal reduces anxiety and mismatch in relationships where partners differ.

punchline.text: Two types of desire. Both are completely normal.

quiz.question: What is responsive desire?
options: Desire that emerges after arousal begins
